page: EE60024: Power System Dynamics And Control

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Basic Ideas Modeling of Synchronous machines, excitation systems and GovernorsSteady state, Dynamic and Transient stability. State space formulation of single and multi-machine models with control equipments. Damping effects of FACTS devices. SSR. Application of numerical techniques to multi-machine dynamic and transient stability studies. Generation/Frequency Characteristics and load frequency characteristics, tie-line bias control, Automatic Generation Control, Alert and emergency system operation control. Control of reactive power flow: AVR, OLTC Transformers, FACTS, Static var compensators, system loss minimization.
page: EE60024: Power System Dynamics And Control
